name: Velvet Mist Essence
description: A soft, airy fragrance that blends white florals with a touch of clean musk. Velvet Mist Essence surrounds you with a gentle, comforting freshness perfect for daily wear.

name: Blush Air Whisper
description: A subtle blend of pink peony, pear dew, and soft musk. Blush Air Whisper delivers a youthful, modern scent ideal for those who love light, uplifting perfumes.

name: Radiant Bloom Extrait
description: A luminous floral composition featuring jasmine petals, neroli, and bright citrus top notes. Radiant Bloom Extrait leaves a long-lasting, sophisticated trail.

name: Peach Petal Aura
description: Inspired by sun-kissed peach orchards, this fragrance combines juicy peach, soft vanilla cream, and gentle amber for a fresh yet sensual aroma.

name: Bloom Notes No.05
description: A modern floral blend of rose water, freesia, and powdery amber. Bloom Notes No.05 offers delicate freshness with a refined, feminine character.

name: Sanjhbela Essence Noir
description: A dusk-inspired scent featuring smoky florals, spiced amber, and soft woods. Mysterious, elegant, and perfect for evening wear.

name: Exotic Aura 36
description: A rich multi-layered perfume built with exotic fruits, dark florals, and creamy sandalwood. Designed for bold personalities who love depth and complexity.

name: Mystic Glam Oud
description: A warm, alluring blend of rose, oud wood, and saffron wrapped in smoky resin. Mystic Glam Oud creates an intoxicating, premium niche aroma.

name: White Blossom Veil
description: A delicate fragrance built around white jasmine, soft musk, and creamy lily. Perfect for lovers of clean, floral elegance.

name: Honey Mist Essence
description: A warm, comforting scent blending honey drizzle, vanilla bean, and light citrus. Soft, sweet, and beautifully balanced.

name: Vanilla Soft Focus
description: A gentle fragrance centered around creamy vanilla, cotton musk, and soft powdery notes. Subtle, cozy, and effortlessly wearable.

name: Light Breeze Glow
description: Fresh citrus, white tea, and soft woods combine to create an easy, everyday fragrance that feels refreshing and uplifting.

name: Sunlit Sand Amber
description: Inspired by warm coastal sands, this scent blends amber resin, coconut wood, and soft tonka for a sun-drenched glowing aroma.

name: Crystal Fresh Purity
description: A clean, refreshing fragrance featuring water lily, crisp pear, and airy musk. Perfect for those who love minimalist, pure scents.

name: Lavender Calm Oil
description: A soothing perfume oil crafted from pure lavender essence with subtle herbal undertones. Ideal for layering or nighttime relaxation.

name: Scarlet Bloom Mist
description: A vibrant fruity-floral perfume combining red berries, rose petals, and a whisper of warm amber. Bright, romantic, and charming.

name: Raspberry Kiss Aura
description: A sweet and playful scent blending raspberry nectar with soft petals and creamy musk. Light, fresh, and irresistibly feminine.

name: Red Bloom Intense
description: A bold, long-lasting perfume crafted with dark rose, berry syrup, and sensual amber. Deep, confident, and modern.

name: Cherry Bloom Shine
description: A fruity-floral fragrance featuring cherry blossom, red cherries, and a soft, powdery finish. Feminine and uplifting.

name: Olive Mist Fresh
description: A green, earthy fragrance combining olive leaf, herbal freshness, and clean musk. Unique, modern, and refreshing.

name: Dazzling Aura Sheer
description: A sparkling blend of citrus zest, soft florals, and airy amber. Light, bright, and perfect for everyday elegance.
